mosinstall.name: Table - Content Section
mosinstall.author: Mambo Project
mosinstall.description: Creates a listing of Content categories for a particular section

param.name: menu_image
param.label: Menu Image
param.description: A small image to be placed to the left or right of your menu item, images must be in images/stories/

param.name: pageclass_sfx
param.label: Page Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css classes of the page, this allows individual page styling

param.name: back_button
param.label: Back Button
param.description: Show/Hide a Back Button, that returns you to the previously view page

param.name: page_title
param.label: Page Title
param.description: Show/Hide the Page title

param.name: description
param.label: Description
param.description: Show/Hide the Section Description

param.name: description_image
param.label: Description Image
param.description: Show/Hide image of the Section Description

param.name: categorylist
param.label: Category List
param.description: Show/Hide the category list of section

param.name: categoryitems
param.label: Category Item Count
param.description: Show/Hide the item count of category

param.name: categoriesperrow
param.label: Categories per Row
param.description: Number of categories to display per row

param.name: categoryitemlist
param.label: Item List of Category
param.description: Show/Hide the item list of category

param.name: itemcount
param.label: Item Count
param.description: The number of items to display in the item list of category(default is 5)

param.name: titlelength
param.label: Title Length
param.description: The max length of item title in chars to display, Default 40

param.name: datedisplay
param.label: Date Display
param.description: The display of item created date

param.name: sectionitemlist
param.label: Item List of Section
param.description: Show/Hide the item list of section

param.name: orderby
param.label: Items Order
param.description: Order that the items will be displayed in.

param.name: author
param.label: Author Column
param.description: Show/Hide the Author column

param.name: date
param.label: Date Column
param.description: Show/Hide the Date column

param.name: date_format
param.label: Date Format
param.description: The format of the date displayed, using PHPs strftime Command Format - if left blank it will load the format from your language file

param.name: hits
param.label: Hits Column
param.description: Show/Hide the Hits column

param.name: headings
param.label: Table Headings
param.description: Show/Hide the Table Headings

param.name: navigation
param.label: Navigation Bar
param.description: Show/Hide the Navigation bar

param.name: display_num
param.label: Display Number
param.description: Number of items to be displayed by default

param.name: target
param.label: Target
param.description: Target window when the link is clicked
